snippet: As a government analyst, Mr. Molander was shaken on hearing a military official say that “only 500 million people” would die in a nuclear war.
abstract: Roger C Molander, nuclear arms protest leader, dies at age 71.
lead_paragraph: As a government analyst, Mr. Molander was shaken on hearing a military official say that “only 500 million people” would die in a nuclear war.

headline.seo: Roger C. Molander Dies at 71; Stirred Nuclear Protests
headline.main: Roger C. Molander, Nuclear Protest Leader, Dies at 71
headline.print_headline: Roger C. Molander, Nuclear Protest Leader, Dies at 71
